Create a new synthesizer configuration.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","title":"Name","description":"A unique name for this synthesizer configuration within the organization."},"provider_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Provider Id","description":"The ProviderAccount ID to use for this configuration."},"engine_identifier":{"type":"string","title":"Engine Identifier","description":"Identifier of the specific synthesizer engine from the provider (e.g., 'openai-tts-1')."},"language":{"type":"string","title":"Language","description":"BCP-47 language code (e.g., en-US, fr-FR).","default":"en-US"},"audio_encoding":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Audio Encoding","description":"Audio encoding format (e.g., linear16, mp3 for output if applicable).","default":"linear16"},"sampling_rate":{"anyOf":[{"type":"integer"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Sampling Rate","description":"Audio sampling rate in Hz.","default":16000},"engine_specific_config":{"anyOf":[{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Engine Specific Config","description":"Provider/engine-specific configuration parameters, conforming to the engine's schema."}},"type":"object","required":["name","provider_id","engine_identifier"],"title":"SynthesizerConfigurationCreate"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
